languages.text: "Вы поступили верно, когда избежали битвы и сберегли себя".
"You made the right decision when you chose to avoid combat and save yourselves."
languages.original_text: "Вы поступили верно, когда избежали битвы и сберегли себя".

traits.locale_text: "You made the right decision when you chose to avoid combat and save yourselves."
"You made the right decision when you chose to avoid combat and save yourselves."
"You made the right decision when you chose to avoid combat and save yourselves."
"You made the right decision when you chose to avoid combat and save yourselves."
"You made the right decision when you chose to avoid combat and save yourselves."
"You made the right decision when you chose to avoid combat and save yourselves."

languages.text: "Es war richtig von Euch, einen Kampf zu vermeiden und Euch zu retten."
languages.original_text: "You made the right decision when you chose to avoid combat and save yourselves."

traits.locale_text: "Es war richtig von Euch, einen Kampf zu vermeiden und Euch zu retten."

languages.text: « Vous avez pris la bonne décision en choisissant d'éviter le combat et de vous sauver. »
languages.original_text: "You made the right decision when you chose to avoid combat and save yourselves."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez pris la bonne décision en choisissant d'éviter le combat et de vous sauver. »

languages.text: “你们选择避免正面交战，以此保存实力。这是个正确的决定。”
languages.original_text: "You made the right decision when you chose to avoid combat and save yourselves."

traits.locale_text: “你们选择避免正面交战，以此保存实力。这是个正确的决定。”

languages.text: 「戦闘を避け、己を守る判断は正しい決断だ」
languages.original_text: "You made the right decision when you chose to avoid combat and save yourselves."

traits.locale_text: 「戦闘を避け、己を守る判断は正しい決断だ」

languages.text: «Tomaron la decisión correcta al evitar el combate y salvarse».
languages.original_text: "You made the right decision when you chose to avoid combat and save yourselves."

traits.locale_text: «Tomaron la decisión correcta al evitar el combate y salvarse».

languages.text: "Çatışmadan kaçınıp kendinizi kurtarmayı seçerek doğru kararı vermişsiniz."
languages.original_text: "You made the right decision when you chose to avoid combat and save yourselves."

traits.locale_text: "Savaştan kaçınıp kendinizi kurtarmayı seçerek doğru kararı vermişsiniz."
